system.description: Globe of searing radiance. All in 80-ft. radius blinded and take 6d6 damage (Reflex negates blindness, half damage). Creatures harmed by sunlight take double. Undead take 1d6 per caster level (max 25d6), half on save; undead harmed by bright light destroyed on failed save. Fungi, oozes, slimes damaged as undead. Dispels darkness spells below 9th level.

components.materialDescription: Piece of sunstone and naked flame (arcane); divine focus (divine).
